summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2081, for the improvement of 27th Avenue South from Massachusetts Street to Bayview Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 21175 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
